price: 11. Alle se dib uma dhigo nafi marka ajasheed la gaaro. Alle waa u Xog Ogaal waxaad fashaan.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idhā jāa ajaluhā wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
